titles.title: Flood Prevention Act of 2021
Flood Prevention Act of 2021
A bill to amend the Coastal Zone Management Act of 1972 to allow the District of Columbia to receive Federal funding under such Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Flood Prevention Act of 2021
This bill makes the District of Columbia eligible to receive federal coastal zone management funding, including flood mitigation and prevention funds.
